content: I really like your suggestions! I think I'll create a quiz with a mix of questions that are both humorous and relatable. I'll make sure to keep it light-hearted and fun, and not too serious or invasive. Thanks for the help! By the way, I've been experimenting with different hashtags on Instagram, and I recently started using #newme. Do you think that's a good hashtag to use for my coffee-related posts?
